header.the_what: The what, who, why and how

our_journey.we_never_thought: We never thought that this thing could actually became something like what it is today; let alone something that could be useful for a very few niche of people.
our_journey.millions_campaigns: Millions of campaigns {supporters} later; we believe that we‚Äôre only at the beginning.
our_journey.millions_supporters: (and hundreds of millions of their supporters)

our_milestones.1_detail: It all started with the intention of helping friends generate twibbons for campus events
our_milestones.2_detail: We took it seriously and formed a 3-member team; Mulqan the solo-fighter and Fokker & Nino the childhood friends.
our_milestones.3_detail: Thanks to Indonesia's Independence Day, the general public noticed us. We managed to gain 1 million users!
our_milestones.4_detail: Seeing a lot of heartfelt responses, we took more effort into fixing the website and launched Twibbonize version 2.0!
our_milestones.5_detail: During the pandemic, the Indonesian Ministry of State-Owned Company created #SiapDivaksin campaign on our website which led us to 5 million users!
our_milestones.6_detail: As we gained more publicity from community-based creators (mainly government institutions and big companies), we hit 12 million active users.
our_milestones.7_detail: We successfully charmed Southeast Asian countries. Our users kept growing, mainly from Thailand and the Philippines.
our_milestones.8_detail: A year has passed since we first took a serious step in developing the website. We decided to launch Twibbonize version 3.0!
our_milestones.9_detail: More than 7 thousand active campaigns were generated during the Philippines Presidential Election. This kept us growing in the global digital campaign scene.
our_milestones.10_detail: India‚Äôs Independence Day marked our significant user growth in India. This month we got over 28 Million sessions on our website.
our_milestones.11_detail: We found our users grew significantly in Brazil during Brazil‚Äôs Presidential Election.
our_milestones.12_detail: We launched our Premium subscription plans.
our_milestones.13_detail: We released Twibbonize Editor, allowing users to design Twibbon directly on our website.
our_milestones.14_detail: We launched Twibbonize 4.0 with a fresh look and major updates!

history.in_this: In this digital era, social media has become the go-to platform for one to express support, concerns, and other sentiments.
history.however: However, we sometimes struggle with finding the right words and actions to convey our thoughts effectively.
history.visual_factor: Visual factor holds great power in this context. Twibbon is a simple solution to become the extension of the ideas you want to convey.

header.we_love: We'd love to hear from you! Questions, feedback, or just to say hello, drop us a message below. We'll get back to you ASAP!

office.we_like_our_home: We like our home like we like our designs; clean and minimal. We‚Äôre based in the heart of beautiful Jakarta, so don‚Äôt hesitate to visit by bike, commuter line, or busway too. We have an open door policy.

header.twibbon_result: Twibbon is the result of overlaying a frame template into a photo, typically used in profile pictures or social media posts to express support for a cause, campaign, or event.

frame.twibbon_frame: In Twibbonize, Twibbon is more than frames
frame.we_define: We define Twibbon as a powerful visual template that becomes the extension of your cause, whether in the form of a frame or a background.

faq.question_1: Are the watermark-free and ad-free features only available to Twibbonize Premium account holders?
faq.answer_1: Watermark-free and ad-free are two exclusive features for Twibbonize Premium users. These features allow users to download twibbon without any watermark and enjoy the Twibbonize experience without disruptive ads
faq.question_2: How can we provide the free version of Twibbonize?
faq.answer_2: There are ads in every campaign page in Twibbonize that allow us to grow and provide more campaign pages. Of course, we are trying to manage these ads so they won't disturb your campaign's quality and experience.
faq.question_3: What does ‚ÄúAd-Free‚Äù mean for the Twibbonize Premium users?
faq.answer_3: ‚ÄúAd-Free‚Äù for Twibbonize Premium users means an uninterrupted experience with no advertisements. It allows for a cleaner, more user-friendly navigation throughout the Twibbonize platform.
faq.question_4: What can we customize in the campaign?
faq.answer_4: Twibbonize Premium users can customize the background and color of your campaign page on Twibbonize according to your brand or taste. So that your campaign can look different from the others.
faq.answer_5: With private campaign feature, you can set your campaign to be visible only to certain people.
faq.question_6: What kind of information do I get in Analytics?
faq.answer_6: Analytics provide you with campaigns data. Those data include supporters, interactions, visitors, country & cities, and each module‚Äôs interactions data. With this information, you can predict and measure how successful your campaign is.
faq.answer_7: You can easily pay online via a bank transfer, using a credit card, or e-wallet.
faq.answer_8: You can easily download the invoice directly from your Twibbonize account.
faq.question_9: Where can I find help related to Twibbonize usage?
faq.answer_9: If you are looking for the ‚ÄúFAQ‚Äù page related to Twibbonize usage,click Help Center
